rules_text:
Foreshadow {5}{B} [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
When Dread Elk dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If that creature is a Zombie, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.
flavor_text: [i]Kernon came to Innistrad with one goal in mind: slay the god known as Ghrin-Danu.[/i]
